list.name: Changes
list.comment:
🚀🛠️ Remove unused import and comment out code cleanup
Removed the unused `boolean matcher` import from CardsTest and commented out code blocks in CardsTest and TeamTest for future reference on better implementations. These changes enhance code clarity and maintainability.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ASKED_MARK_IGNORED_FILES_AS_EXCLUDED": "true", "Gradle.Build pbt-kt.executor": "Run", "Gradle.ListTest (1).executor": "Run", "Gradle.ListTest.executor": "Run", "Gradle.StringLengthTest.executor": "Run", "Kotest.BiggestTest: The biggest element in a list (1).executor": "Run", "Kotest.BiggestTest: The biggest element in a list.executor": "Run", "Kotest.CapitalizeTest: Capitalization (1).executor": "Run", "Kotest.CapitalizeTest: Capitalization.executor": "Run", "Kotest.CapitalizeTest: Capitalizing a string.executor": "Run", "Kotest.CardsTest: A hand of cards (1).executor": "Run", "Kotest.CardsTest: A hand of cards (2).executor": "Run", "Kotest.CardsTest: A hand of cards.executor": "Run", "Kotest.EncodeDecodeTest: Encoding and decoding an input should return the original input (1).executor": "Run", "Kotest.EncodeDecodeTest: Encoding and decoding an input should return the original input.executor": "Run", "Kotest.MapTest: The biggest key in a map (1).executor": "Run", "Kotest.MapTest: The biggest key in a map.executor": "Run", "Kotest.QueueTest: A queue.executor": "Run", "Kotest.ReverseTest: Reversing a list.executor": "Run", "Kotest.TeamTest: A team.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "E:/Documentos/Code/Teaching/pbt-kt/generators/src", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
Refactor project structure and update dependencies
Removed the `generalization` module and its related files, including configuration and tests. Added a new `symmetric-properties` module with initial implementations for Encode/Decode and list transformation functions. Updated project properties and configuration files accordingly.

✨📦️✅ Add new modules: assumptions, filter, and introduction
This commit introduces three new modules: assumptions, filter, and introduction, each with its own build.gradle.kts. It also includes initial Kotlin code and corresponding tests for string manipulation and merging functionality. Additionally, project configuration files have been updated to include these new modules.

✨✅ Add biggest function and corresponding tests
Implemented the biggest function to find the max integer in a list, returning Int.MIN_VALUE for empty lists. Added comprehensive tests for the function using Kotest. Also included tests for string length properties.

✨✅️ Add reverse function and unit tests
Implemented a generic function to reverse lists and added comprehensive unit tests using Kotest. Updated IntelliJ run configurations to include the new tests.

✨✅⚙️ Add capitalizeWords extension function and tests
Implemented a Kotlin extension function capitalizeWords to capitalize the first letter of each word in a string. Comprehensive unit tests using Kotest ensure the function behaves as expected across various input scenarios. Updated IntelliJ run configurations to include these new tests for seamless integration into the development workflow.

✨🔍 Add `biggest` functions and tests
Implemented functions to find the biggest integer in a list (`biggest`) and the biggest key in a map (`biggestKey`). Added comprehensive unit tests using Kotest to verify functionality. Updated project configuration files and IntelliJ run configurations accordingly.

✨ Add Suit and Rank enums with test cases
Introduced `Suit` and `Rank` enums to represent card suits and ranks, respectively. Added `CardsTest` class to validate card hand integrity using these enums. Updated IntelliJ configurations to include tests for these additions.

Add Role enum and TeamTest class
Introduced `Role` enum to define team roles (LEADER, DEVELOPER, TESTER). Created `TeamTest` class to validate the presence of these roles in a team using property-based testing with Kotest. Updated IntelliJ run configurations for the new test class.

🚀🛠️ Remove unused import and comment out code cleanup
Removed the unused `boolean matcher` import from CardsTest and commented out code blocks in CardsTest and TeamTest for future reference on better implementations. These changes enhance code clarity and maintainability.

MESSAGE.value:
Simplify project structure by removing old config files
Removed obsolete Gradle, IntelliJ, and Kotlin configuration files and .gitignore entries. Added new directories and files representing different modules and projects to streamline the project setup.

Refactor project structure and update dependencies
Removed the `generalization` module and its related files, including configuration and tests. Added a new `symmetric-properties` module with initial implementations for Encode/Decode and list transformation functions. Updated project properties and configuration files accordingly.

✨️✅ Add new modules: assumptions, filter, and introduction
This commit introduces three new modules: assumptions, filter, and introduction, each with its own build.gradle.kts. It also includes initial Kotlin code and corresponding tests for string manipulation and merging functionality. Additionally, project configuration files have been updated to include these new modules.

✨✅ Add biggest function and corresponding tests
Implemented the biggest function to find the max integer in a list, returning Int.MIN_VALUE for empty lists. Added comprehensive tests for the function using Kotest. Also included tests for string length properties.

✨✅️ Add reverse function and unit tests
Implemented a generic function to reverse lists and added comprehensive unit tests using Kotest. Updated IntelliJ run configurations to include the new tests.

✨✅⚙️ Add capitalizeWords extension function and tests
Implemented a Kotlin extension function capitalizeWords to capitalize the first letter of each word in a string. Comprehensive unit tests using Kotest ensure the function behaves as expected across various input scenarios. Updated IntelliJ run configurations to include these new tests for seamless integration into the development workflow.

✨ Add `biggest` functions and tests
Implemented functions to find the biggest integer in a list (`biggest`) and the biggest key in a map (`biggestKey`). Added comprehensive unit tests using Kotest to verify functionality. Updated project configuration files and IntelliJ run configurations accordingly.

✨ Add Suit and Rank enums with test cases
Introduced `Suit` and `Rank` enums to represent card suits and ranks, respectively. Added `CardsTest` class to validate card hand integrity using these enums. Updated IntelliJ configurations to include tests for these additions.

Add Role enum and TeamTest class
Introduced `Role` enum to define team roles (LEADER, DEVELOPER, TESTER). Created `TeamTest` class to validate the presence of these roles in a team using property-based testing with Kotest. Updated IntelliJ run configurations for the new test class.

️ Remove unused import and comment out code cleanup
Removed the unused `boolean matcher` import from CardsTest and commented out code blocks in CardsTest and TeamTest for future reference on better implementations. These changes enhance code clarity and maintainability.
